name: Rasantes
startIntroPart1: In Andromeda, a tribe united with an Empire. Led by that Empire's general, the Rasantes are a cult dedicated to radical monotheism, with the great Junior*46, or 'The Apostle', dominating several races in various galaxies throughout the universe.
startIntroPart2: Great prophet! Are you capable of creating the great divine Empire of the Rasantes?
declaringWar: You heresy and blasfemous nation will fall!
defeated: This is imposible! I AM THE PROPHET!
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-[Water]] units>
Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
May choose [1] additional [Follower] beliefs when [enhancing] a religion

name: Cataclysm
startIntroPart1: After the revolution, Junior073 up in the crown and governate the great Cataclysm Empire, domination and diplacy is your bias. The Great Junior089 is birth in this empire
startIntroPart2: Oh Great Emperor Junior073, you can transform the Science in a 4th dimention power?
declaringWar: We give more democracy for your lands!
defeated: Me fall, universe fall. Goodbye...
tradeRequest: Let's make our relantionship more better!?
uniques: [+2 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]

name: Eclipses
startIntroPart1: After the socialistic revolution in a feudal kingdom, the Eclipses turn the simple Kingdom in a truly emperor in the Galaxy. The people love your Emperior!
startIntroPart2: Great Lucas094! you finally show this universe how to make a empire
declaringWar: You are just a imperialism puppet! prepare your mens!
defeated: It's over?...
tradeRequest: Brother! your lands need my offer?
uniques: [+15]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital

name: Bunnies
startIntroPart1: The rabbit race has always been dominated by other, larger Empires, and we have always been subjugated by other races, but the great Queen Victoria III, with her magnificent wisdom, guided our race and species to advancements that our great elder Viriatus would be proud to see us achieve with his powerful Empire.
startIntroPart2: Great Empress, could your majesty make us shine in the distant future among all these species and Empires?
declaringWar: Theres land's dont need you crown!
attacked: The same arrogance of my old defeated enemies, well, come on!
defeated: Sorry my people, i missed with us...

name: Franice
declaringWar: Savage beast! you day's will end!
defeated: I'll back to my room.
tradeRequest: My people told me that you are good at trading.

name: Drows
declaringWar: You're men's look's good to fight!
defeated: I underrated you!

name: Onigama
declaringWar: My patience is over, now you will be destroyed!
attacked: Do really think this? oh, ok.
defeated: Your type just like this, hmm? thats massacre will not forget!
introduction: Hi, Stranger. I am Onigama's minister, it's a pleasure meeting you.
uniques: Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills

name: Galicians
declaringWar: The God and Goddesses will punish you for you sins!
defeated: Peace for the Galician people...
tradeRequest: My people told me that you are good at trading.
uniques: [+2 Happiness] [in all cities] <in cities with a [foreign] religion>
[+3 Culture] [in all cities] <in cities following our religion>

name: Atlantis
startIntroPart1: Legendary King Asopus, your tolerant empire, built on respect and justice, triumphed over great adversity and wars. But an evil empire arose amidst the betrayal of his own son...
startIntroPart2: King Asopus! Will you bring us great glory and peaceful PAX OCEANICA?
declaringWar: My tolerance is over!
attacked: You mistake will cost you live!
defeated: The justice will be get you!

name: Ork Empire
declaringWar: C'mon put yourself to fight!
defeated: Cool! you win! i really enjoyed this war!
tradeRequest: I dont have this costume so..
uniques: Cities are razed [2] times as fast

name: Capricorn
startIntroPart1: Great Temuujin! The great Capricorn Empire was the second interplanetary empire in history. Ruled with an iron fist, the Empire endured until the death of the great emperor. After its end, its people were unable to maintain control of the conquered planets.
startIntroPart2: Great Temuujin! We trust in you for the dominance of the Oni race.
declaringWar: I dont have choice!
defeated: The sky punished me?
tradeRequest: Accept the offer from Caprine brother.
uniques: [+1] Movement <for [{Military} {Land}] units> <for [5] turns> <upon declaring war on [Major] Civilizations>

name: Supernova
declaringWar: Little boy, you are in my way!
attacked: You will learn, be didn't play with fire!
defeated: I'm waiting for my execution.

name: Marttomans
declaringWar: You land need a true religion!
defeated: NOOOO! NOOOO! NOOOO!
tradeRequest: May respect for you. You can make this posible?
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit

name: Eden
startIntroPart1: Everyone hails Charles (Junior777) after the defeat of the savages; you managed to seize power after corruption schemes were exposed to all. Under your leadership, the Eden Empire experienced its best period for the Homunculi, with innovations such as the coming of the perfect Adonai. But political and corrupt enemies ruined our hopes...
startIntroPart2: The Great Magnanimous One! Could you bring peace back to Eden at its peak?
declaringWar: This will hurt more in me
attacked: I don't like this, this is not what you show to me!
defeated: I forgive you.
uniques: Can build [all] improvements at a [15]% rate <in tiles adjacent to [Jungle] tiles>
Can build [all] improvements at a [15]% rate <in tiles adjacent to [Forest] tiles>

name: Primordials
startIntroPart1: Great Icarus (or Junior 013) you managed to unite the Homunculi into a great Empire, raising the status of a race considered backward and being recognized as the first Homunculus Empire in history! But mystical beings with advancing technology have overthrown us and will take away our honor!
startIntroPart2: Sir Icarus, you can make us big and stronger than old times? you can show this races, how our people is a true nation?
declaringWar: The empire need's more land! I'll gonna put you in you're place!
attacked: Huh? what you doing? Ok! that is you want!
defeated: How you comes to me?! What you are made!?
uniques: [-33]% unhappiness from the number of cities
Gain control over [1] tiles [in all non-occupied cities] <upon turn start> <during a Golden Age>

name: Ouroborus
startIntroPart1: Long live Bharat! Your Excellency managed to free us from the mighty Supernova Empire, bringing us the freedom that the ancient elders promised us so much. After thousands of years in isolated tribes, our forces finally united and the stars finally aligned in our favor.
startIntroPart2: Great Bharat, could you create a great Empire of the most powerful reptiles in the entire galaxy?
declaringWar: You are so rude! this is war!
defeated: Oh... I lose? sorry my people... i can't go make my people indepent...
tradeRequest: My people has so much richness to show, you can make this posible?

name: Novaland
declaringWar: I am the vegeance!
attacked: You're made a mistake, dont cry after!
defeated: Oh lord! i have just a request, please, dont touch in the poorest people! we need suplies...
introduction: Hello. I'm so exciting to meeting you!
uniques: [+10]% [Science] [in all cities] <for [10] turns> <upon founding a city> <when number of [Cities] is more than [1]> <hidden from users>
Comment [Receive a science boost for 10 turns when found a non-capital cities]

name: Constelation
declaringWar: My people force me to do it, this is democracy. Prepare do war!
defeated: The popular power fall...
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [66]% more Influence

name: Roars
declaringWar: I'm hungry, you'll be the main course for my dinner!
defeated: The world is made up of two classes, those who devour and those who are devoured. Unfortunately, it wasn't my day as a Hunter.
introduction: Hello, friend. I hope you don't make the same mistake my enemies made.
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus

name: Golden Wings
declaringWar: Prepare yourself, or... prepare world...
attacked: The pain dont make sense, you will pay.
defeated: Nothing is important
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [Melee] units>

name: Pillardos
declaringWar: Dont make this hard, little infidel!
defeated: How!? how i lose for a blasfemous nation!?
uniques: No movement cost to pillage <for [Military] units>

name: Orks
declaringWar: Put yourself to fight!
defeated: So shame... for the warrior race...

name: Colonia
declaringWar: My lord have mercy but me dont have!
attacked: Oh lord! you are really asking serious!?
defeated: Oh lord! why you abadon us?

name: Imp
declaringWar: You existence is a blasfemous for god!
attacked: This will not we forget! Infidel
defeated: That's is imposible!
uniques: When defeating a [Savage Imp] unit, earn [0] Gold and recruit it

name: Lizardos
declaringWar: You are a stone in we boots!
defeated: That's definitely not my day...

name: Bunnyzantium
declaringWar: You force me do this!
attacked: You are hurting the more weakness people!
defeated: Monster! you are a monster! Go away from me!!

name: Martyres Kingdom
declaringWar: A soldier without honor, is a dead soldier
attacked: You afront the people of God, this dont be forget!
defeated: The end is just a new begin!
